entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Hudson Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:30 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hudson Bay 07:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: -9.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -11.0°C
Wind: SSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Freezing rain or snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain beginning this morning then changing to snow this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
